mapper.sql: select id, bui_name, bui_id, cate_id, real_bui_id, order_id, is_type, server_charge, consignment_price, send_user_id, pay_user_id, to_pay, consignment_status, form_info, created_by, created_time, updated_by, updated_time from cnt_consignment
mapper.select: select js.id, js.is_type isType, js.bui_id buiId, js.bui_name buiName, js.consignment_price consignmentPrice, js.server_charge serverCharge, js.consignment_status consignmentStatus, js.to_pay toPay, cs.nick_name collectorName, cs.phone collectorPhone, mr.nick_name sellerName, mr.phone sellerPhone, o.pay_type payType, o.order_amount orderAmount, o.created_time createOrderTime, o.pay_time payTime from cnt_consignment js left join cnt_user cs on js.send_user_id=cs.id left join cnt_user mr on js.pay_user_id=mr.id left join cnt_order o on js.order_id=o.id where js.is_type=#{isType} and js.id=#{id}
